name: supermarket-promotion
description: In a supermarket there is a promotion for the first 10 customers, whereby the customer gets a discount from a number that is chosen at random. If the chosen number is less than 50, the discount is 15% of the total purchase, if it is greater than or equal to 50 the discount is 20%. Obtain how much money is deducted from each customer and the total to pay.
author: Carlos Rodriguez <rwkamandriw@gmail.com>
